PPRContentConfiguration

@objc
public class PPRContentConfiguration : NSObject

This class provides interfaces for configuring text in benefit screen and success screen.

Since

1.0.0
  • benefitText

    Set the description that user is going to get benefit with product registration. If multilple benefits are there, please provide the content separated by \n. To be displayed at screen PR-1a.(Please refer to the flow document for more info).

    Since

    1.0.0

    Declaration

    Swift

    @objc
public var benefitText: String?
  • extendWarrantyText

    Set the description along with extended warranty after successful registration of product. To be displayed at screen PR-4b.(Please refer to the flow document for more info). The default localized text for the key PRG_Extended_Warranty_Lbltxt will be displayed in case vertical is not providing the description.

    Since

    1.0.0

    Declaration

    Swift

    @objc
public var extendWarrantyText: String?
  • emailText

    Set the description about what information user will get via email. To be displayed at screen PR-4b.(Please refer to the flow document for more info). The default localized text for the key PRG_Eamil_Sent_Lbltxt will be displayed in case vertical is not providing the description.

    Since

    1.0.0

    Declaration

    Swift

    @objc
public var emailText: String?
  • mandatoryRegisterButtonText

    Set the button text of the product registeration button in case if mandatoryProductRegistration is set to true. To be displayed at screen PR-4b.(Please refer to the flow document for more info).

    Since

    1805.0.0

    Declaration

    Swift

    @objc
public var mandatoryRegisterButtonText: String?
  • mandatoryProductRegistration

    Set the value as true and false to hide the No Thanks, Register Later button.(Please refer to the flow document for more info).

    Since

    1805.0.0

    Declaration

    Swift

    public var mandatoryProductRegistration: Bool?
